title: Download the 3 minigames we made in 48 hours, with your input! (Team Jam Packed - Thunderdome XI)
body:
https://imgur.com/4Kly4Oy

Hi everyone!

It’s been a wild ride, but we did it. We made 3 mini-games in 48 hours, with the help of your thoughts and feels along the way. And now we’re so excited to release… 

**Star Guardian: Insomnia** – Blast Void monsters and save the city as Star Guardian Jinx in this bullet-hell side-scroller.

https://imgur.com/ODS7H4M

**PROJECT.EXEcute** – Play as PROJECT Lucian or Vayne as you fight through swarms of killer robots. Team up with a local duo or tackle the hoards solo in the twin-stick shooter.

https://imgur.com/EBcyNAD

**Super Zac Ball** – Challenge a local friend or a bot to a game of Super Zac Ball, a sports arcade game where each character has their own ~~Super ability~~ unique playstyle (whoops, earlier un-caffeinated ideas crept through there).

https://imgur.com/Fmu4VlB

**Download all three mini-games in one package here!**
**([64-bit (recommended)](https://d3a99h1uu682xq.cloudfront.net/JamPackedDisc-0.2-Win64.exe) / [32-bit (this might be bad)](https://d3a99h1uu682xq.cloudfront.net/JamPackedDisc-0.2-Win32.exe)**)

_Disclaimers: These games, unlike League of Legends, Blitzcrank’s Poro Roundup, Mechs vs Minions, etc., are NOT official Riot products. They are unoptimized and may not be compatible with all machines._

Huge thank you to everyone who participated in the playtests and chatted with us throughout development. We wouldn’t have made it without your encouragement, live input, and memes. Y’all are awesome.

Head over to [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/teamjampacked/) and [Twitter](https://twitter.com/teamjampacked) if you’d like to see some behind-the-scenes footage of the madness, or drop by our [Discord](https://discord.gg/jHvdTmu) to ask questions, share game stories, and post your high scores. Otherwise… glhf!

replies.body:
Extremely legitimate and official Super Zac Ball [strategy guide](https://i.imgur.com/hQKobtS.jpg)

https://i.imgur.com/hQKobtS.jpg
Woot! Was super fun to work on these, hope you have as much fun playing them! :)
Riot gameS

hey guys just wondering if these are still available, i did try to download but link came up with this message 

"This XML file does not appear to have any style information associated with it."

id love to try these out so if anyone has any ideas please let me know
thank you all
Yep I'm wondering the same thing...{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
How many of you guys were working on these games?

We had ~ 25 person teams on each game with some folks floating across all three and then a similar-sized team helping to organize everything. It was a really big group! We had about a day and a half of proper production with about half a day to wrap up and make sure we could actually put them in an exe and ship. :)
Wow that's crazy lol.  Good job :3
So when are you guys going to do the Heimerdinger Tower Defense game?
These are great! Played them for a bit and they're actually fun no lies  {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
You an download the game through the internet archive guys :) https://web.archive.org/web/20180318144741/https://d3a99h1uu682xq.cloudfront.net/JamPackedDisc-0.2-Win64.exe
